content.en: Symbolic Regression Enhancement: Researchers are investigating various methods to improve symbolic regression, a technique used for modeling and prediction in dynamical systems. These methods include bloat control, new data structures, mixed-integer nonlinear programming, and shape-constrained regression. They are also comparing different algorithms and frameworks to determine their performance and interpretability. The goal is to enhance the accuracy and generalization capabilities of symbolic regression algorithms.
content.da: Symbolsk regression forbedring: Forskere undersøger forskellige metoder til at forbedre symbolsk regression, en teknik brugt til modellering og forudsigelse i dynamiske systemer. Disse metoder inkluderer bloat-kontrol, nye datastrukturer, blandet-heltal ikke-lineær programmering, og formbegrænset regression. De sammenligner også forskellige algoritmer og rammer for at bestemme deres ydeevne og fortolkelighed. Målet er at forbedre nøjagtigheden og generaliseringsevnen af symbolske regressionsalgoritmer.
